main event: A resident of Baltimore reported observing a very distant ball-shaped object with a bright blinking red light on 27 December 1954.
interesting points: The object was seen for approximately 3 minutes,The observer described the object as having bright blinking lights,Military aircraft were also misidentified as UFOs during this time,Five UFO cases were reported in the Baltimore area during the period,One case remains unidentified while others were attributed to aircraft, balloons, or celestial objects.
sighted object: distant ball-shaped object with bright blinking red light
